user_query: I'm planning a trip to France with my family and I would like to explore the country using a map with French labels. Could you please provide me with a raster map tile of zoom level 4, X-coordinate 8, and Y-coordinate 5? Additionally, I need to convert the coordinates of a specific location from the WGS84 geodetic system to the Tokyo geodetic system. The latitude and longitude of the location are 35.624822 and 139.742121 respectively.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a raster map tile of France with French labels at zoom level 4, X-coordinate 8, and Y-coordinate 5.
Convert the specified latitude and longitude coordinates from the WGS84 geodetic system to the Tokyo geodetic system.
